author: Carlos Castaneda
message: The trick is in what one emphasizes. We either make ourselves miserable, or we make ourselves happy. The amount of work is the same.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dhammapada
message: Just as a flower, which seems beautiful has color but no perfume, so are the fruitless words of a man who speaks them but does them not.
title: Thought of the day

author: Seneca
message: Things that were hard to bear are sweet to remember.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry James
message: Three things in human life are important. The first is to be kind. The second is to be kind. The third is to be kind.
title: Thought of the day
